events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but they have a scratch on the left ear cup and the sound sometimes cuts out.
The issue has been categorized as a product defect based on the customer's report of physical damage and faulty audio.
The case has been assigned to an agent specializing in product defects for further assistance.

Here are the photos showing the scratch on the left ear cup and a video demonstrating the audio cutting out intermittently.
Thank you for the photos and video. We can offer you a replacement pair or a full refund. Please let us know which you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement, please. Thanks for the quick response and clear options.
We have processed your replacement request and a new set of headphones will be shipped within two business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement headphones and that everything is working well.

We have sent you a survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
